clips.title: This Giant Chicken Is Real & Legit Terrifying
clips.body:
Loch Ness. Bigfoot. Giant chicken. One of these things actually exists, and it's not the one you want. A video recently surfaced online of the biggest poultry meat you've ever seen, leaving viewers asking one crucial question: Is this giant chicken real? We're all going to have nightmares tonight, because yes, it's real. And it's legitimately a behemoth of a chicken. It appears to be roughly the weight of a horse. Except it's a chicken.
    Upon seeing this video, my first thought was that this poo…
clips.author: Megan Grant

clips.title: The US Officially Bans Electronics On Flights From 8 Countries
clips.body:
On Tuesday, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security announced that it is indefinitely banning U.S.-bound travelers from eight countries from bringing electronics on board, except their cell phones. This announcement is highly impactful, as dozens of flights arrive into the U.S. every day from the majority-Muslim countries and airports delineated in the ban.
    The Guardian first reported that an electronics ban might be forthcoming, revealing on Monday that a confidential email from the TSA indica…
clips.author: Sarah Friedmann
